p: Zhiwen Yang et al. [ 77] developed a synthesis of bright blue emissive perovskite NCs inspired by hot injection method [ 8] with chemical formula CsBr:Eu 2+ with an FWHM of 31 nm and PLQY of 32.8%. The authors showed principle opportunity to employ these NCs as a phosphor material for fabricating down-conversion white LEDs ( Figure 4f,g).
